channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16946] Provide Raw scan as an option in VerifyReplication
item.description: Provide an option on including Raw scans while doing VerifyReplication with default value as 'false'.
item.summary: Provide Raw scan as an option in VerifyReplication

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Do you want to attach a patch ?
Yes, I would like to attach a patch to this. Can you assign this to me. Ted Yu

Added Raw Scan option with default value as false.
Added test case to validate the change.

-1 overall

This message was automatically generated.

434	        final String includeDeletedCellsArgKey = "--raw=";

Since the switch is a boolean, there is no need for the '='.
Meaning when user specifies this flag, raw scan would be used.
Fixed the code for the suggestions given and removed extra white spaces.

This message was automatically generated.
Verified the failed tests. They are not related to my change.

TestReplicationSmallTests#testVerifyRepJobWithRawOptions took 2 minutes on my laptop.
On Jenkins machine it would take longer.

Can you make the test run faster or move it to another test file - (TestReplicationSmallTests took 325 seconds) ?

Modified test to reduce time taken to execute. If this still takes more time, then will move the test to a new file.

Ted Yu
